And I'd do it again in an instant.

properties.name: Lightning, Spell, AoE, Chaining, Duration, Brand

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, firing beams which deal damage to nearby enemies and those around them. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
